level.heading: Declaration.
level.text: A military-overseas ballot must include or be accompanied by a declaration signed by the voter that a material misstatement of fact in completing the ballot may be grounds for a conviction of making a false statement under the laws of the District.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 13 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
